## Provider type

Provider definitions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Provider<R, O extends BaseOptions> = {
    type: ProviderType.Constructor;
    value: Constructor<R, O>;
} | {
    type: ProviderType.Factory;
    value: Factory<R, O>;
} | {
    type: ProviderType.Instance;
    value: R;
} | {
    type: ProviderType.None;
    value: undefined;
};
```
